# Code Analysis Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/code-analysis.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/code-analysis.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Analyze code structure, quality, patterns, and dependencies
- **Used By**: Architect, Developer, Reviewer, Tester
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
